code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import authReducer from"./reducers/authReducer";import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import socketReducer from"./reducers/socketReducer";import modalReducer from"./reducers/modalReducer";import gameReducer from"./reducers/gameReducer";var reducers=combineReducers({auth:authReducer,socketPage:socketReducer,modalPage:modalReducer,gamePage:gameReducer,form:formReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));export default store;
